name: Zapper (itch)
description:
You are a mercenary who is hired to assist the EAAU space fleet.

Show your skills in different missions and become the galaxy's hero.

Playtime: 20 - 40 min  (~30 min)

The game is a colorful pixel-style 2D space combat simulator.
It contains 12 levels with various objectives and themes.

During combat you will have to prioritise collecting power-ups and use ammunition wisely.

You can change your ship, upgrade it, or add powerfull extentions to it at shops.
Eventhough you lose everything after death, you keep a part of all the money you have ever earned by killing enemys.

Containers spread over the levels allow you to unlock new ships, upgrades and extentions.

Collectables:

Crystals are money you gain from defeated enemysRestores ammunition barsrestores healthgives a speed boostspeeds up firespeedboosts damageenhances bullet speedexpands bullet range

All collectables and their effetc are displayed in the tutorial overlay ;)

Too easy / Too boring? Enable 'Hyper mode' in the settings.
Feel free to enable/disable the round-corners-theme in the settings.

  • requires Java 1.7+
  • sound effects and themes will be added with a later version.
